downloadTitle: Microsoft Lync 2010 Attendant Quick Reference Card
downloadDescription: This quick reference card describes the tasks that you most commonly do by using Micorsoft Lync 2010 Attendant.
detailsSection: Microsoft Lync 2010 Attendant is an integrated call management application with which you can effectively manage several conversations. You do this by quickly handling and routing phone calls and instant messages.
installInstructionSection: To install the download, save the file to a directory on your computer. After you save the file, open the document as you typically would. To remove the download, delete the file from the directory where you saved it.
